This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} causes instant growth of a humanoid creature, doubling its height and multiplying its weight by 8. This increase changes the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category to the next larger one. The target gains a +2 size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a –2 size {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} (to a minimum of 1), and a –1 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} due to its increased size. Melee and ranged weapons used by this creature deal more {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.[LONGSTART]
A humanoid creature whose size increases to Large has a space of 10 feet and a natural {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} of 10 feet. This spell does not change the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}.
Enlarge person dispels reduce person.[LONGEND]
